main event: Mr. John Doe reported sighting an unidentified flying object over his home in Dalton, Massachusetts on the evening of February 23, 1960.
interesting points: The object was reported to be elliptical in shape and emitting a bright, pulsating light., Mr. Doe observed the object as it moved in a westerly direction., The object was at an altitude of approximately 1,000 feet and moving at a high rate of speed., The sighting was reported to the Pittsfield Police Department, who notified the Air Force., The report has been forwarded to Project Blue Book for further investigation.
sighted object: unidentified flying object emitting a bright, pulsating light
witness description: Mr. John Doe, a resident of Dalton, Massachusetts
